mapper.insert: insert into bb_ext_cred (created, modified, password, referenceGuid, referenceType, type, username, version, guid) values (#{created}, #{modified}, #{password}, #{owner.guid}, #{owner.ownerType}, #{type}, #{username}, #{version}, #{guid})
mapper.update: update bb_ext_cred set modified = #{modified,jdbcType=DATE}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, referenceGuid = #{owner.guid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, referenceType = #{owner.ownerType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, where guid = #{guid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select * from bb_ext_cred where referenceGuid = #{guid} and type = #{type} order by modified desc limit 1
